queries.description: Returns the height of the block immediately above the highest solid block at the input (x,z) position
queries.name: query.above_top_solid

queries.description: Returns the number of actors rendered in the last frame.
queries.name: query.actor_count

queries.description: Requires at least 3 arguments. Evaluates the first argument, then returns 1.0 if all of the following arguments evaluate to the same value as the first. Otherwise it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.all

queries.description: Only valid in an animation controller.  Returns 1.0 if all animations in the current animation controller state have played through at least once, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.all_animations_finished

queries.description: Returns if the item or block has all of the tags specified.
queries.name: query.all_tags

queries.description: Returns the anger level of the actor [0,n). On errors or if the actor has no anger level, returns 0. Available on the Server only.
queries.name: query.anger_level

queries.description: Returns the time in seconds since the current animation started, else 0.0 if not called within an animation.
queries.name: query.anim_time

queries.description: Requires at least 3 arguments. Evaluates the first argument, then returns 1.0 if any of the following arguments evaluate to the same value as the first. Otherwise it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.any

queries.description: Only valid in an animation controller.  Returns 1.0 if any animation in the current animation controller state has played through at least once, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.any_animation_finished

queries.description: Returns if the item or block has any of the tags specified.
queries.name: query.any_tag

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if all of the arguments are within 0.000000 of each other, else 0.0.
queries.name: query.approx_eq

queries.description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the color of the armor in the requested slot. The valid values for the armor slot index are 0 (head), 1 (chest), 2 (legs), 3 (feet) and 4 (body).
queries.name: query.armor_color_slot

queries.description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the damage value of the requested slot. The valid values for the armor slot index are 0 (head), 1 (chest), 2 (legs), 3 (feet) and 4 (body). Support for entities other than players may be limited, as the damage value is not always available on clients.
queries.name: query.armor_damage_slot

queries.description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the armor material type in the requested armor slot. The valid values for the armor slot index are 0 (head), 1 (chest), 2 (legs) and 3 (feet).
queries.name: query.armor_material_slot

queries.description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns the texture type of the requested slot. The valid values for the armor slot index are 0 (head), 1 (chest), 2 (legs), 3 (feet) and 4 (body).
queries.name: query.armor_texture_slot

queries.description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the average frame time over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.average_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.average_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.average_frame_time(1)' will return the average frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 0 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.
queries.name: query.average_frame_time

queries.description: Returns the duration of the mob's swing/attack animation, determined by the carried item and unmodified by effects applied on the mob. To access the swing/attack animation progress, use "variable.attack_time" instead.
queries.name: query.base_swing_duration

queries.description: Returns the block face for this (only valid for certain triggers such as placing blocks, or interacting with block) (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).
queries.name: query.block_face

queries.description: Takes a world-origin-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has all of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.block_has_all_tags

queries.description: Takes a world-origin-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has any of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.block_has_any_tag

queries.description: Takes a block-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has all of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.block_neighbor_has_all_tags

queries.description: Takes a block-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has any of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.block_neighbor_has_any_tag

queries.description: Returns the value of the associated block's Block State.
queries.name: query.block_property

queries.description: Returns the value of the associated block's Block State.
queries.name: query.block_state

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is blocking, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.blocking

queries.description: Returns the body pitch rotation if called on an actor, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.body_x_rotation

queries.description: Returns the body yaw rotation if called on an actor, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.body_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the axis aligned bounding box of a bone as a struct with members '.min', '.max', along with '.x', '.y', and '.z' values for each.
queries.name: query.bone_aabb

queries.description: Takes the name of the bone as an argument. Returns the bone orientation (as a matrix) of the desired bone provided it exists in the queryable geometry of the mob, else this returns the identity matrix and throws a content error.
queries.name: query.bone_orientation_matrix

queries.description: TRS stands for Translate/Rotate/Scale.  Takes the name of the bone as an argument.  Returns the bone orientation matrix decomposed into the component translation/rotation/scale parts of the desired bone provided it exists in the queryable geometry of the mob, else this returns the identity matrix and throws a content error.  The returned value is returned as a variable of type 'struct' with members '.t', '.r', and '.s', each with members '.x', '.y', and '.z', and can be accessed as per the following example: v.my_variable = q.bone_orientation_trs('rightarm'); return v.my_variable.r.x;
queries.name: query.bone_orientation_trs

queries.description: Returns the initial (from the .geo) pivot of a bone as a struct with members '.x', '.y', and '.z'.
queries.name: query.bone_origin

queries.description: Returns the initial (from the .geo) rotation of a bone as a struct with members '.x', '.y', and '.z' in degrees.
queries.name: query.bone_rotation

queries.description: Takes two distances (any order) and return a number from 0 to 1 based on the camera distance between the two ranges clamped to that range.  For example, 'query.camera_distance_range_lerp(10, 20)' will return 0 for any distance less than or equal to 10, 0.2 for a distance of 12, 0.5 for 15, and 1 for 20 or greater.  If you pass in (20, 10), a distance of 20 will return 0.0.
queries.name: query.camera_distance_range_lerp

queries.description: Returns the rotation of the camera.  Requires one argument representing the rotation axis you would like (0 for x, 1 for y).
queries.name: query.camera_rotation

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can climb, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_climb

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can damage nearby mobs, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_damage_nearby_mobs

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can dash, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.can_dash

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can fly, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_fly

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can power jump, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_power_jump

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can swim, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_swim

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity can walk, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.can_walk

queries.description: Returns value between 0.0 and 1.0 with 0.0 meaning cape is fully down and 1.0 is cape is fully up.
queries.name: query.cape_flap_amount

queries.description: DEPRECATED (please use query.block_face instead) Returns the block face for this (only valid for on_placed_by_player trigger) (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).
queries.name: query.cardinal_block_face_placed_on

queries.description: Returns the current facing of the player (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).
queries.name: query.cardinal_facing

queries.description: Returns the current facing of the player ignoring up/down part of the direction (North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).
queries.name: query.cardinal_facing_2d

queries.description: Returns the current facing of the player (Down=0.0, Up=1.0, North=2.0, South=3.0, West=4.0, East=5.0, Undefined=6.0).
queries.name: query.cardinal_player_facing

queries.description: Returns the max render distance in chunks of the current client. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.client_max_render_distance

queries.description: Returns a number representing the client RAM memory tier, 0 = 'SuperLow', 1 = 'Low', 2 = 'Mid', 3 = 'High', or 4 = 'SuperHigh'. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.client_memory_tier

queries.description: Combines any valid entity references from all arguments into a single array.  Note that order is not preserved, and duplicates and invalid values are removed.
queries.name: query.combine_entities

queries.description: Returns the total cooldown time in seconds for the item held or worn by the specified equipment slot name (and if required second numerical slot id), otherwise returns 0. Uses the same name and id that the replaceitem command takes when querying entities.
queries.name: query.cooldown_time

queries.description: Returns the cooldown time remaining in seconds for specified cooldown type or the item held or worn by the specified equipment slot name (and if required second numerical slot id), otherwise returns 0. Uses the same name and id that the replaceitem command takes when querying entities. Returns highest cooldown if no parameters are supplied.
queries.name: query.cooldown_time_remaining

queries.description: Counts the number of things passed to it (arrays are counted as the number of elements they contain; non-arrays count as 1).
queries.name: query.count

queries.description: Returns the squish value for the current entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.current_squish_value

queries.description: DEPRECATED. DO NOT USE AFTER 1.20.40. Please see camel.entity.json script.pre_animation for example of how to now process dash cooldown. Returns dash cooldown progress if the entity can dash, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.dash_cooldown_progress

queries.description: Returns the day of the current level.
queries.name: query.day

queries.description: Returns the elapsed ticks since the mob started dying.
queries.name: query.death_ticks

queries.description: debug log a value to the output debug window for builds that have one
queries.name: query.debug_output

queries.description: Returns the time in seconds since the previous frame.
queries.name: query.delta_time

queries.description: Returns the distance of the root of this actor or particle emitter from the camera.
queries.name: query.distance_from_camera

queries.description: Returns the total number of active emitters of the callee's particle effect type.
queries.name: query.effect_emitter_count

queries.description: Returns the total number of active particles of the callee's particle effect type.
queries.name: query.effect_particle_count

queries.description: Compares the biome the entity is standing in with one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if all of the tag names match. Only supported in resource packs (client-side).
queries.name: query.entity_biome_has_all_tags

queries.description: Compares the biome the entity is standing in with one or more identifier names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if any of the identifier names match. Only supported in resource packs (client-side).
queries.name: query.entity_biome_has_any_identifier

queries.description: Compares the biome the entity is standing in with one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if any of the tag names match. Only supported in resource packs (client-side).
queries.name: query.entity_biome_has_any_tags

queries.description: Returns the number of equipped armor pieces for an actor from 0 to 5, not counting items held in hands. (To query for hand slots, use query.is_item_equipped or query.is_item_name_any).
queries.name: query.equipment_count

queries.description: Takes a slot name followed by any tag you want to check for in the form of 'tag_name' and returns 1 if all of the tags are on that equipped item, 0 otherwise.
queries.name: query.equipped_item_all_tags

queries.description: Takes a slot name followed by any tag you want to check for in the form of 'tag_name' and returns 0 if none of the tags are on that equipped item or 1 if at least 1 tag exists.
queries.name: query.equipped_item_any_tag

queries.description: Takes the desired hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns whether the item is an attachable or not.
queries.name: query.equipped_item_is_attachable

queries.description: Returns the X eye rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.eye_target_x_rotation

queries.description: Returns the Y eye rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.eye_target_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is attacking from range (i.e. minecraft:behavior.ranged_attack), else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.facing_target_to_range_attack

queries.description: Returns the ratio (from 0 to 1) of how much between AI ticks this frame is being rendered.
queries.name: query.frame_alpha

queries.description: Returns the integer id of an actor by its string name.
queries.name: query.get_actor_info_id

queries.description: Returns the current texture of the item
queries.name: query.get_animation_frame

queries.description: Gets specified axis of the specified bone orientation pivot.
queries.name: query.get_default_bone_pivot

queries.description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_item_name_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and a second parameter (0=default) if you would like the equipped item or any non-zero number for the currently rendered item, and returns the name of the item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied) if there is one, otherwise returns ''.
queries.name: query.get_equipped_item_name

queries.description: Returns a value in range [0.0, 1.0] based on the level seed.
queries.name: query.get_level_seed_based_fraction

queries.description: Gets specified axis of the specified locator offset.
queries.name: query.get_locator_offset

queries.description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_name_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.)Get the name of the mob if there is one, otherwise return ''.
queries.name: query.get_name

queries.description: Returns value of Pack Setting slider, parameter is name of slider. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.get_pack_setting

queries.description: Gets specified axis of the specified locator offset of the root model.
queries.name: query.get_root_locator_offset

queries.description: Takes in one or more arguments ('simple', 'fancy', 'deferred', 'raytraced'). If the graphics mode of the client matches any of the arguments, return 1.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.graphics_mode_is_any

queries.description: Returns the ground speed of the entity in meters/second.
queries.name: query.ground_speed

queries.description: Usable only in behavior packs when determining the default value for an entity's Property. Requires one string argument. If the entity is being loaded from data that was last saved with a component_group with the specified name, returns 1.0, otherwise returns 0.0. The purpose of this query is to allow entity definitions to change and still be able to load the correct state of entities.
queries.name: query.had_component_group

queries.description: Returns 1 if the entity has any of the specified families, else 0.
queries.name: query.has_any_family

queries.description: Returns whether or not the entity is currently leashing other entities of the designated types.
queries.name: query.has_any_leashed_entity_of_type

queries.description: Takes the armor slot index as a parameter, and returns 1.0 if the entity has armor in the requested slot, else it returns 0.0. The valid values for the armor slot index are 0 (head), 1 (chest), 2 (legs) and 3 (feet).
queries.name: query.has_armor_slot

queries.description: Returns whether or not a Block Placement Target has a specific biome tag
queries.name: query.has_biome_tag

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the associated block has the given block state or 0.0 if not.
queries.name: query.has_block_property

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the associated block has the given block state or 0.0 if not.
queries.name: query.has_block_state

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the player has a cape, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.has_cape

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has collisions enabled, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.has_collision

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has cooldown on its dash, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.has_dash_cooldown

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is affected by gravity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.has_gravity

queries.description: Returns boolean whether an Actor has an item in their head armor slot or not, or false if no actor in current context
queries.name: query.has_head_gear

queries.description: Returns true if the entity has an owner ID else it returns false
queries.name: query.has_owner

queries.description: Returns 1 if the entity has a player riding it in any seat, else it returns 0.
queries.name: query.has_player_rider

queries.description: Takes one argument: the name of the property on the Actor. Returns 1.0 if a property with the given name exists, 0 otherwise.
queries.name: query.has_property

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a rider, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.has_rider

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a target, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.has_target

queries.description: Returns the roll angle of the head of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.head_roll_angle

queries.description: Takes one argument as a parameter.  Returns the nth head x rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.head_x_rotation

queries.description: Takes one argument as a parameter.  Returns the nth head y rotation of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0. Horses, zombie horses, skeleton horses, donkeys and mules require a second parameter that clamps rotation in degrees.
queries.name: query.head_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the health of the entity, or 0.0 if it doesn't make sense to call on this entity.
queries.name: query.health

queries.description: Returns the heartbeat interval of the actor in seconds. Returns 0 when the actor has no heartbeat.
queries.name: query.heartbeat_interval

queries.description: Returns the heartbeat phase of the actor. 0.0 if at start of current heartbeat, 1.0 if at the end. Returns 0 on errors or when the actor has no heartbeat. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.heartbeat_phase

queries.description: Queries Height Map
queries.name: query.heightmap

queries.description: Returns the hurt direction for the actor, otherwise returns 0.
queries.name: query.hurt_direction

queries.description: Returns the hurt time for the actor, otherwise returns 0.
queries.name: query.hurt_time

queries.description: Requires 3 numerical arguments: some value, a minimum, and a maximum. If the first argument is between the minimum and maximum (inclusive), returns 1.0. Otherwise returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.in_range

queries.description: Returns the number of ticks of invulnerability the entity has left if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.invulnerable_ticks

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is admiring, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_admiring

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is alive, and 0.0 if it's dead.
queries.name: query.is_alive

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is angry, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_angry

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is attached to another entity (such as being held or worn), else it will return 0.0. Available only with resource packs.
queries.name: query.is_attached

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the actor is attached to an entity, else it will return 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_attached_to_entity

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is fleeing from a block, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_avoiding_block

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is fleeing from mobs, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_avoiding_mobs

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is a baby, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_baby

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is breathing, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_breathing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has been bribed, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_bribed

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is carrying a block, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_carrying_block

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is casting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_casting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is celebrating, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_celebrating

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is doing a special celebration, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_celebrating_special

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is charged, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_charged

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is charging, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_charging

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has chests attached to it, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_chested

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the specified held or worn item has the specified cooldown category, otherwise returns 0.0. First argument is the cooldown name to check for, second argument is the equipment slot name, and if required third argument is the numerical slot id. For second and third arguments, uses the same name and id that the replaceitem command takes when querying entities.
queries.name: query.is_cooldown_category

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is crawling, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.is_crawling

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is critical, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_critical

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is croaking, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_croaking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is dancing, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_dancing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is attacking using the delayed attack, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_delayed_attacking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is digging, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_digging

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is eating, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_eating

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is eating a mob, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_eating_mob

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is an elder version of it, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_elder

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is emerging, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_emerging

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is emoting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_emoting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is enchanted, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_enchanted

queries.description: DEPRECATED after 1.20.40. Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_2 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_feeling_happy

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is immune to fire, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_fire_immune

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is being rendered in first person mode, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_first_person

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if an entity is a ghost, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_ghost

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is gliding, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_gliding

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is grazing, or 0.0 if not.
queries.name: query.is_grazing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is idling, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_idling

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is ignited, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_ignited

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is an illager captain, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_illager_captain

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in contact with any water (water, rain, splash water bottle), else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_contact_with_water

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in lava, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_lava

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in love, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_love

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is rendered as part of the UI, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_ui

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in water, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_water

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is in water or rain, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_in_water_or_rain

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is interested, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_interested

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is invisible, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_invisible

queries.description: Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if there is an item in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_item_equipped

queries.description: Takes an equipment slot name (see the replaceitem command) and an optional slot index value. (The slot index is required for slot names that have multiple slots, for example 'slot.hotbar'.) After that, takes one or more full name (with 'namespace:') strings to check for. Returns 1.0 if an item in the specified slot has any of the specified names, otherwise returns 0.0. An empty string '' can be specified to check for an empty slot. Note that querying slot.enderchest, slot.saddle, slot.armor, or slot.chest will only work in behavior packs. A preferred query to query.get_equipped_item_name, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.
queries.name: query.is_item_name_any

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is doing a jump goal jump, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_jump_goal_jumping

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is jumping, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_jumping

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is laying down, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_laying_down

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is laying an egg, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_laying_egg

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is leashed to something, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_leashed

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is levitating, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_levitating

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is lingering, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_lingering

queries.description: Takes no arguments. Returns 1.0 if the entity is the local player for the current game window, else it returns 0.0. In splitscreen returns 0.0 for the other local players for other views. Always returns 0.0 if used in a behavior pack.
queries.name: query.is_local_player

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is moving, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_moving

queries.description: Takes one or more arguments. If the entity's name is any of the specified string values, returns 1.0. Otherwise returns 0.0. A preferred query to query.get_name, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.
queries.name: query.is_name_any

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_on_fire

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is on the ground, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_on_ground

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_onfire

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is orphaned, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_orphaned

queries.description: Takes one or more arguments. Returns whether the root actor identifier is any of the specified strings. A preferred query to query.owner_identifier, as it can be adjusted by Mojang to avoid breaking content if names are changed.
queries.name: query.is_owner_identifier_any

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the Pack Setting toggle is enabled, parameter is name of toggle. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.is_pack_setting_enabled

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the Pack Setting dropdown (first parameter) matches the string value of the second parameter (selection). Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.is_pack_setting_selected

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the player has a persona or premium skin, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_persona_or_premium_skin

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is playing dead, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_playing_dead

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is powered, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_powered

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is pregnant, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_pregnant

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is using a ram attack, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_ram_attacking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is resting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_resting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is riding, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_riding

queries.description: Returns whether or not the entity is currently riding an entity of any of the designated types.
queries.name: query.is_riding_any_entity_of_type

queries.description: DEPRECATED after 1.20.40. Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_2 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_rising

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is currently roaring, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_roaring

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is rolling, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_rolling

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity has a saddle, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_saddled

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is scared, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_scared

queries.description: DEPRECATED after 1.20.40. Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_1 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_scenting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is searching, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_searching

queries.description: Returns true if the player has selected an item in the inventory, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_selected_item

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is casting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_shaking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is shaking water off, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_shaking_wetness

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is able to be sheared and is sheared, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sheared

queries.description: Returns 1.0f if the entity has an active powered shield if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_shield_powered

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is silent, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_silent

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sitting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sitting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sleeping, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sleeping

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sneaking, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sneaking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sneezing, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sneezing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sniffing, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sniffing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is using sonic boom, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sonic_boom

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is spectator, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_spectator

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is sprinting, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_sprinting

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is stackable, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_stackable

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is stalking, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_stalking

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is standing, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_standing

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is currently stunned, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_stunned

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is swimming, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_swimming

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is tamed, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_tamed

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is transforming, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_transforming

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is using an item, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_using_item

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is climbing a wall, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.is_wall_climbing

queries.description: Returns the amount of time an item has been in use in seconds up to the maximum duration, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.item_in_use_duration

queries.description: Takes one optional hand slot as a parameter (0 or 'main_hand' for main hand, 1 or 'off_hand' for off hand), and returns 1.0 if the item is charged in the requested slot (defaulting to the main hand if no parameter is supplied), otherwise returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.item_is_charged

queries.description: Returns the maximum amount of time the item can be used, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.item_max_use_duration

queries.description: Returns the amount of time an item has left to use, else 0.0 if it doesn't make sense. Item queried is specified by the slot name 'main_hand' or 'off_hand'. Time remaining is normalized using the normalization value, only if one is given, else it is returned in seconds.
queries.name: query.item_remaining_use_duration

queries.description: query.item_slot_to_bone_name requires one parameter: the name of the equipment slot.  This function returns the name of the bone this entity has mapped to that slot.
queries.name: query.item_slot_to_bone_name

queries.description: Returns the ratio between the previous and next key frames.
queries.name: query.key_frame_lerp_time

queries.description: Returns the "max_duration" value of "damage_conditions" from the main-hand item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component, or 0 if the component is not present.
queries.name: query.kinetic_weapon_damage_duration

queries.description: Returns the "delay" value from the main-hand item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component, or 0 if the component is not present.
queries.name: query.kinetic_weapon_delay

queries.description: Returns the "max_duration" value of "dismount_conditions" from the main-hand item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component, or 0 if the component is not present.
queries.name: query.kinetic_weapon_dismount_duration

queries.description: Returns the "max_duration" value of "knockback_conditions" from the main-hand item's "minecraft:kinetic_weapon" component, or 0 if the component is not present.
queries.name: query.kinetic_weapon_knockback_duration

queries.description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the last frame.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.last_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.last_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.last_frame_time(1)' will return the frame time of two frames ago.  Currently we store the history of the last 0 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Passing an index more than the available data will return the oldest frame stored.
queries.name: query.last_frame_time

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity was last hit by the player, else it returns 0.0. If called by the client always returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.last_hit_by_player

queries.description: Takes one or more arguments ('keyboard_and_mouse', 'touch', or 'gamepad'). If the last input used is any of the specified string values, returns 1.0. Otherwise returns 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.last_input_mode_is_any

queries.description: Returns the number of entities for which this entity is the leash holder.
queries.name: query.leashed_entity_count

queries.description: Returns the lie down amount for the entity.
queries.name: query.lie_amount

queries.description: Returns the limited life span of an entity, or 0.0 if it lives forever
queries.name: query.life_span

queries.description: Returns the time in seconds since the current animation started, else 0.0 if not called within an animation.
queries.name: query.life_time

queries.description: Takes an array of distances and returns the zero - based index of which range the actor is in based on distance from the camera. For example, 'query.lod_index(10, 20, 30)' will return 0, 1, or 2 based on whether the mob is less than 10, 20, or 30 units away from the camera, or it will return 3 if it is greater than 30.
queries.name: query.lod_index

queries.description: debug log a value to the content log
queries.name: query.log

queries.description: Returns the use time maximum duration for the main hand item if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.main_hand_item_max_duration

queries.description: Returns the use time for the main hand item.
queries.name: query.main_hand_item_use_duration

queries.description: Returns the entity's mark variant
queries.name: query.mark_variant

queries.description: Returns the max durability an item can take.
queries.name: query.max_durability

queries.description: Returns the maximum health of the entity, or 0.0 if it doesn't make sense to call on this entity.
queries.name: query.max_health

queries.description: Returns the maximum trade tier of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.max_trade_tier

queries.description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the most expensive frame over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.maximum_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.maximum_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.maximum_frame_time(1)' will return the maximum frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 0 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.
queries.name: query.maximum_frame_time

queries.description: Returns the time in *seconds* of the least expensive frame over the last 'n' frames.  If an argument is passed, it is assumed to be the number of frames in the past that you wish to query.  'query.minimum_frame_time' (or the equivalent 'query.minimum_frame_time(0)') will return the frame time of the frame before the current one.  'query.minimum_frame_time(1)' will return the minimum frame time of the previous two frames.  Currently we store the history of the last 0 frames, although note that this may change in the future.  Asking for more frames will result in only sampling the number of frames stored.
queries.name: query.minimum_frame_time

queries.description: Returns the scale of the current entity.
queries.name: query.model_scale

queries.description: Returns the total distance the entity has moved horizontally in meters (since the entity was last loaded, not necessarily since it was originally created) modified along the way by status flags such as is_baby or on_fire.
queries.name: query.modified_distance_moved

queries.description: Returns the current walk speed of the entity modified by status flags such as is_baby or on_fire.
queries.name: query.modified_move_speed

queries.description: Returns the duration of the mob's swing/attack animation, determined by the carried item and modified by effects applied on the mob. To access the swing/attack animation progress, use "variable.attack_time" instead.
queries.name: query.modified_swing_duration

queries.description: Returns the brightness of the moon (FULL_MOON=1.0, WANING_GIBBOUS=0.75, FIRST_QUARTER=0.5, WANING_CRESCENT=0.25, NEW_MOON=0.0, WAXING_CRESCENT=0.25, LAST_QUARTER=0.5, WAXING_GIBBOUS=0.75).
queries.name: query.moon_brightness

queries.description: Returns the phase of the moon (FULL_MOON=0, WANING_GIBBOUS=1, FIRST_QUARTER=2, WANING_CRESCENT=3, NEW_MOON=4, WAXING_CRESCENT=5, LAST_QUARTER=6, WAXING_GIBBOUS=7).
queries.name: query.moon_phase

queries.description: Returns the specified axis of the normalized position delta of the entity.
queries.name: query.movement_direction

queries.description: Queries Perlin Noise Map
queries.name: query.noise

queries.description: Returns the time that the entity is on fire, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.on_fire_time

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the entity is out of control, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.out_of_control

queries.description: DEPRECATED (Do not use - this function is deprecated and will be removed).
queries.name: query.overlay_alpha

queries.description: DEPRECATED (Use query.is_owner_identifier_any instead if possible so names can be changed later without breaking content.) Returns the root actor identifier.
queries.name: query.owner_identifier

queries.description: Returns the players level if the actor is a player, otherwise returns 0.
queries.name: query.player_level

queries.description: Returns the absolute position of an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).
queries.name: query.position

queries.description: Returns the position delta for an actor.  Takes one argument that represents the desired axis (0 == x-axis, 1 == y-axis, 2 == z-axis).
queries.name: query.position_delta

queries.description: Returns the previous squish value for the current entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.previous_squish_value

queries.description: Takes one argument: the name of the property on the entity. Returns the value of that property if it exists, else 0.0 if not.
queries.name: query.property

queries.description: Takes an entity-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has all of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.relative_block_has_all_tags

queries.description: Takes an entity-relative position and one or more tag names, and returns either 0 or 1 based on if the block at that position has any of the tags provided.
queries.name: query.relative_block_has_any_tag

queries.description: Returns how much durability an item has remaining.
queries.name: query.remaining_durability

queries.description: Returns the body pitch world-rotation of the ride an entity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.ride_body_x_rotation

queries.description: Returns the body yaw world-rotation of the ride of on an entity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.ride_body_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the head x world-rotation of the ride of an entity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.ride_head_x_rotation

queries.description: Takes one optional argument as a parameter. Returns the head y world-rotation of the ride of an entity, else it returns 0.0. First parameter only for horses, zombie horses, skeleton horses, donkeys and mules that clamps rotation in degrees.
queries.name: query.ride_head_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the body pitch world-rotation of a valid rider at the provided index if called on an entity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.rider_body_x_rotation

queries.description: Returns the body yaw world-rotation of a valid rider at the provided index if called on an entity, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.rider_body_y_rotation

queries.description: Takes one argument as a parameter. Returns the head x world-rotation of the rider entity at the provided index, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.rider_head_x_rotation

queries.description: Takes one or two arguments as parameters. Returns the head y world-rotation of the rider entity at the provided index, else it returns 0.0. Horses, zombie horses, skeleton horses, donkeys and mules require a second parameter that clamps rotation in degrees.
queries.name: query.rider_head_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the roll counter of the entity.
queries.name: query.roll_counter

queries.description: Returns the rotation required to aim at the camera.  Requires one argument representing the rotation axis you would like (0 for x, 1 for y).
queries.name: query.rotation_to_camera

queries.description: Takes one argument - the name of the scoreboard entry for this entity. Returns the specified scoreboard value for this entity. Available only with behavior packs.
queries.name: query.scoreboard

queries.description: Returns a number representing the server RAM memory tier, 0 = 'SuperLow', 1 = 'Low', 2 = 'Mid', 3 = 'High', or 4 = 'SuperHigh'. Available on the server side (Behavior Packs) only.
queries.name: query.server_memory_tier

queries.description: Returns the shaking angle of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.shake_angle

queries.description: Returns the shake time of the entity.
queries.name: query.shake_time

queries.description: Returns the how much the offhand shield should translate down when blocking and being hit.
queries.name: query.shield_blocking_bob

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if we render the entity's bottom, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.show_bottom

queries.description: Returns the current sit amount of the entity.
queries.name: query.sit_amount

queries.description: Returns the entity's skin ID
queries.name: query.skin_id

queries.description: Returns the rotation of the bed the player is sleeping on.
queries.name: query.sleep_rotation

queries.description: Returns the sneeze counter of the entity.
queries.name: query.sneeze_counter

queries.description: Returns a struct representing the entity spell color for the specified entity. The struct contains '.r' '.g' '.b' and '.a' members, each 0.0 to 1.0. If no actor is specified, each member value will be 0.0.
queries.name: query.spellcolor

queries.description: Returns the scale of how standing up the entity is.
queries.name: query.standing_scale

queries.description: Only valid in an animation controller. Returns the time in seconds in the current animation controller state.
queries.name: query.state_time

queries.description: Returns the structural integrity for the actor, otherwise returns 0.
queries.name: query.structural_integrity

queries.description: Returns the particle color for the block located in the surface below the actor (scanned up to 10 blocks down). The struct contains '.r' '.g' '.b' and '.a' members, each 0.0 to 1.0. If no actor is specified or if no surface is found, each member value is set to 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.surface_particle_color

queries.description: Returns the texture coordinate for generating particles for the block located in the surface below the actor (scanned up to 10 blocks down) in a struct with 'u' and 'v' keys. If no actor is specified or if no surface is found, u and v will be 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.surface_particle_texture_coordinate

queries.description: Returns the texture size for generating particles for the block located in the surface below the actor (scanned up to 10 blocks down). If no actor is specified or if no surface is found, each member value will be 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.surface_particle_texture_size

queries.description: Returns how swollen the entity is.
queries.name: query.swell_amount

queries.description: Returns the swelling direction of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.swelling_dir

queries.description: Returns the amount the current entity is swimming.
queries.name: query.swim_amount

queries.description: Returns the angle of the tail of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.tail_angle

queries.description: Returns the x rotation required to aim at the entity's current target if it has one, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.target_x_rotation

queries.description: Returns the y rotation required to aim at the entity's current target if it has one, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.target_y_rotation

queries.description: Returns the icon index of the experience orb.
queries.name: query.texture_frame_index

queries.description: Returns the number of ticks elapsed since the user last hit something while using a kinetic weapon. Returns -1.0 if no kinetic weapon is being used or if nothing has been hit yet. Hits that occur while the user is unloaded are not counted.
queries.name: query.ticks_since_last_kinetic_weapon_hit

queries.description: Returns the time of day (midnight=0.0, sunrise=0.25, noon=0.5, sunset=0.75) of the dimension the entity is in.
queries.name: query.time_of_day

queries.description: Returns the time in seconds since the last vibration detected by the actor. On errors or if no vibration has been detected yet, returns -1. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.time_since_last_vibration_detection

queries.description: Returns the current time stamp of the level
queries.name: query.time_stamp

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_1 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.timer_flag_1

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_2 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.timer_flag_2

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if behavior.timer_flag_3 is running, else it returns 0.0.
queries.name: query.timer_flag_3

queries.description: Returns the total number of active emitters in the world.
queries.name: query.total_emitter_count

queries.description: Returns the total number of active particles in the world.
queries.name: query.total_particle_count

queries.description: Returns 1.0 if the touch input only affects the touchbar, otherwise returns 0.0. Available on the Client (Resource Packs) only.
queries.name: query.touch_only_affects_hotbar

queries.description: Returns the trade tier of the entity if it makes sense, else it returns 0.0
queries.name: query.trade_tier

queries.description: Always returns zero. (Was originally meant to indicate Panda unhappiness but due to an early code change it has always only returned zero)
queries.name: query.unhappy_counter

queries.description: Returns the entity's variant index
queries.name: query.variant

queries.description: Returns the speed of the entity up or down in meters/second, where positive is up.
queries.name: query.vertical_speed

queries.description: Returns the total distance traveled by an entity while on the ground and not sneaking.
queries.name: query.walk_distance

queries.description: Returns the wing flap position of the entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.wing_flap_position

queries.description: Returns the wing flap speed of the entity, or 0.0 if this doesn't make sense.
queries.name: query.wing_flap_speed

queries.description: Returns the entity's yaw speed
queries.name: query.yaw_speed
